cards.title: Vikral
gameplay: When a Microstorm enters play, add 3 tokens to its Torrent pool.
At the start of your turn, remove a token from each Torrent pool in play.
When a Microstorm has no tokens in its Torrent pool, destroy it.
powers: Draw a card.  You may remove a Torrent token from a card in your play area to draw another card.
incapacitatedAbilities: Up to 2 non-hero targets deal themselves 1 Radiant damage.
One hero may use a power.
Until the start of your next turn, whenever a target is destroyed, one target deals itself 2 Radiant damage.

openingLines.default: You're not nearly the biggest OR the scariest...

cards.title: Bear Claw Dash
body: Vikral deals 1 target 2 melee damage. You may discard a card. If you do, you may play a card.

cards.title: Serrated Claws
powers: Vikral deals 1 target 2 melee damage.  That target deals itself one toxic damage at the end of this turn.

cards.title: Shotgun Blast
powers: Vikral deals one target X energy damage, where X is the amount of microstorms in play plus 1.

cards.title: Scatter Deflector
powers: The next time Vikral would be dealt three or more damage, prevent that damage. Then, the source of that damage deals up to X targets 1 damage of that type each, where X is the amount of damage prevented this way. This power can not stack.

cards.title: Foiled by Wanton Destruction
body: Destroy a villain ongoing, device with 6 or less HP, or relic with 6 or less HP.
You may destroy a microstorm. If you do so, skip the next villain play phase.

cards.title: Wild Calling
body: Select a Microstorm in play. Search your deck or trash for a Microstorm listed on the selected card. If you searched your deck, shuffle it afterwards.
You may draw a card.

cards.title: Stormheart Surge
cards.body: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. For each card discarded this way, add a Torrent token to a Microstorm.

cards.title: Recycling Mana
cards.body: When this card enters play, add a torrent token to up to 2 microstorms, then destroy any other copies of Recycling Mana.  When a microstorm enters play, add an extra torrent token to it.

cards.title: Gasping Surge
cards.body: When this card enters play, you may play a microstorm. When a microstorm is destroyed, Vikral may deal a target 1 damage of a type listed on that card.

cards.title: Clarity Shot
cards.powers: Vikral deals a target X energy damage, where X is 3 minus the number of Microstorms in play. If no damage is dealt this way, increase damage dealt to that target by 1 this turn.

cards.title: Hail Flurry
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 cold damage.
If Flaring Blaze is in play, Vikral deals 2 other targets 1 cold damage.
If Bladed Gale is in play, reduce the next damage dealt by targets dealt damage this way by 1.

cards.title: Flaring Blaze
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 fire damage.
If Hail Flurry is in play, this damage is increased by 1.
If Toxic Cloud is in play, this damage is irreducible.

cards.title: Scathing Sandstorm
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 projectile damage.
If Psionic Torrent or Toxic Cloud is in play, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
If Psionic Torrent and Toxic Cloud are both in play, skip the next environment play phase.

cards.title: Bladed Gale
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 sonic damage.
If Vigilante Justice or Thunder Storm are in play, increase the next damage dealt to that target by 1.
If Vigilante Justice and Thunder Storm are in play, prevent the next damage dealt by that target.

cards.title: Vigilante Justice
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 radiant damage.
If Bladed Gale is in play, this damage cannot be redirected.
If Psionic Torrent is in play, that target deals itself 1 radiant damage.

cards.title: Vicious Retribution
body: If Thunder Storm is in play, increase damage dealt due to this card by X, where X is the number of times Vikral has been dealt damage since the end of your last turn.
At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 infernal damage.
If Hail Flurry is in play, Vikral deals that target 1 infernal damage.

cards.title: Thunder Storm
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 lightning damage.
If Scathing Sandstorm or Overload Pulse is in play, you may destroy an environment card.
If Scathing Sandstorm and Overload Pulse are in play, another player may play a card.

cards.title: Toxic Cloud
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 toxic damage.
If Overload Pulse or Vigilante Justice is in play, you may destroy one villain target with 3 HP or less.
If Overload Pulse and Vigilante Justice are both in play, you may redirect the next damage dealt by that target to another target.

cards.title: Psionic Torrent
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 psychic damage.
If Vicious Retribution is in play, until the end of your next turn, when that target deals another target damage, it deals itself 1 psychic damage.
If Flaring Blaze is in play, increase the next damage dealt by Vikral by 1.

cards.title: Overload Pulse
body: At the end of your turn, Vikral deals 1 target 1 energy damage.
If Scathing Sandstorm or Vicious Retribution is in play, you may destroy an ongoing card.
If Scathing Sandstorm and Vicious Retribution are in play, another hero may use a power.

Destroy any number of non-character hero cards.  For each card destroyed this way, a hero regains 2 HP.

openingLines.default: When my ravaging storm is over, only we will stay standing!
